words.source: H3947 (לָקַח, 'to take'), conjunction + Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And Amram took', ESV 'Amram took', NASB 'Amram married'
H6019 (עַמְרָם, 'Amram'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Amram'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3115 (יוֹכֶבֶד, 'Jochebed'), proper noun; KJV 'Jochebed', ESV 'Jochebed', NASB 'Jochebed'
H1733 (דּוֹדָה, 'aunt/father's sister'), noun common feminine singular construct + 3ms suffix; KJV 'his father's sister', ESV 'his father's sister', NASB 'his father's sister'
Preposition-lamed + 3ms suffix; KJV 'to him', ESV (implied), NASB (implied) — reflexive dative
H802 (אִשָּׁה, 'woman/wife'), preposition-lamed + noun common feminine singular absolute; KJV 'to wife', ESV 'as his wife', NASB 'as his wife'
H3205 (יָלַד, 'to bear/give birth'), conjunction + Qal wayyiqtol 3fs; KJV 'and she bare him', ESV 'She bore him', NASB 'and she bore him'
Preposition-lamed + 3ms suffix; KJV 'him', ESV 'him', NASB 'him' — indirect object

H6019 (עַמְרָם, 'Amram'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Amram'
